meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed oleandomycin to cure the infection.
meanings.sent2: I took oleandomycin to get rid of the bacteria in my body.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but oleandomycin crashed it!
meanings.sent4: Oleandomycin acted like a superhero, fighting off the bacterial villains.
meanings.sent5: The oleandomycin worked tirelessly to eliminate the bacterial invaders.

meanings.definition: A medication that belongs to the macrolide class of antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: My pharmacist recommended oleandomycin for the infection.
meanings.sent2: The macrolide antibiotic, oleandomycin, is effective against certain bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The macrolide family welcomed oleandomycin with open arms.
meanings.sent4: Oleandomycin stood out among the macrolide medications like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: I learned about the macrolide antibiotic, oleandomycin, in my science class.
